title: Client-Side Validation Fix
description:
Validation bypass lets users submit harmful payloads.

Objective: Bypass client-side checks to identify missing server-side validation and implement it.
dialogue: Mira: "I think the site only checks input with JavaScript. That's not enough!"
Mira: "Can you help me test and add server-side validation?"
hints: Disable JS to see what unvalidated data is sent.
Use browser console or Tamper Data.
